title: Wider Bulk Upload Modal - Match App Content Width
description: Enhance BulkUploadModal to use full available width (1200px max) matching the main application content area for improved usability and consistency

complexity.reasoning: Atomic-level feature: Single file modification, pure CSS/styling change, no logic changes, no dependencies, < 1 day effort, zero risk

primary_deliverables: Modal width expanded to 1200px max (matching app main content)
Responsive behavior maintained across screen sizes
constraints: Padding and readability must not degrade
Modal must remain centered on screen

business_value.user_problem: Modal appears narrow on large monitors, wasting horizontal space and creating inconsistency with main app layout
business_value.impact: Improved UX consistency, better use of screen space, more comfortable textarea interaction
success_metrics: Zero visual regressions on all screen sizes
User comfortable experience with additional horizontal space

technical_approach.implementation_notes: Fixed positioning modal, so width is viewport-relative. Design tokens used for spacing consistency.

risks.risk: Modal too wide on mobile devices
risks.mitigation: Use responsive width (90% with maxWidth) to handle all screen sizes

risks.risk: Content overflow or text wrapping issues
risks.mitigation: Existing padding/spacing via design tokens handles this; textarea is already flexible

notes: L0 feature - quick UI enhancement. Pure styling modification with zero functional risk. Ready for implementation approval.
